import { motion } from "framer-motion" const About = () => { return (

Hey, I'm AK.


My journey with technology began back in the early 90's connecting to bulletin boards and IRC chats via a 4.4kbps modem from the school library. I remain obsessed and in awe of the power technology affords us.{" "}


Our ability to transmit information faster and further and in increasingly higher fidelity has and will continue to transform our world. I'm continuously inspired to explore life. To learn. To grow. & to iterate toward the best version of my self.


This has led me to explore many things including owning and operating my own business managing teams of upto 450 people, to travelling the world as a skydiving and body-flight coach, and most recently to explore a career in software engineering.

) } export default About
